args:
Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" .
House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-Louisiana) said “the time has come” to disband the Department of Education,...
House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-Louisiana) said “the time has come” to disband the Department of Education, as President Donald Trump has pledged. Shutting down the department would require congressional approval.
Johnson suggested that teachers’ unions will “viciously fight” the decision.
“[We’ve] got to wait for more details to be laid out, but you’re going to see a lot of support among House — and I think Senate — Republicans for the general idea of pushing the decisions back down to the local level,” he said.
